Title: The Motel Guest
Writer: Kevin White, Eugene Levy (created by), Dan Levy (created by), Chris Pozzebon (executive story editor), Stephanie Kaliner (story editor), Matt Kippen (story editor), David West Read (story editor), Amanda Walsh (story editor), Kevin White
Actors: Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara, Dan Levy, Annie Murphy
Plot: The Roses' peace and quiet at the motel is interrupted in the middle of the night by a new guest who has moved in next door. They will learn that that guest is Roland, who is trying to hide...
